org.docgene.model

Class XMLSentence

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.docgene.model.XMLSentence
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FontType, ParagraphElement, StyledElement

    public class XMLSentence
extends java.lang.Object
implements ParagraphElement, FontType
    Represent a sentence in a paragraph.
